TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ToolboxBitmapAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 这使您可以指定一个图标来表示容器的控件，例如 Microsoft Visual Studio 窗体设计器。

span.span: Allows you to specify an icon to represent a control in a container, such as the Microsoft Visual Studio Form Designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以将应用到控件，以便容器，如 Microsoft Visual Studio 窗体设计器中，可以检索一个图标，表示的控件。You can apply a to a control so that containers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio Form Designer, can retrieve an icon that represents the control. 图标位图可以保存在文件本身或嵌入程序集中包含控件。The bitmap for the icon can be in a file by itself or embedded in the assembly that contains the control. 在中嵌入的位图的大小控件的程序集 （或存储在单独文件中的） 应为 16 × 16。The size of the bitmap that you embed in the control's assembly (or store in a separate file) should be 16 by 16. 方法的对象能返回小型 16 × 16 图像或它通过扩展的小图像创建一个大型 32 × 32 映像。The method of a object can return the small 16 by 16 image or a large 32 by 32 image that it creates by scaling the small image. 若要将其他版本的图标用于不同版本的程序集，您无需修改每个版本的 。If you want to use different versions of your icons with different versions of your assembly, you do not have to modify the for each version. 相反，您可使用 或 声明此程集，并为每个程序集版本指定一个 配置值。Instead, you can declare the assembly with a or a , and specify a configuration value for each assembly version. 在此情况下，使用追加的位图后缀来解释由 表示的文件名。In this case, a file name indicated by a is interpreted with the bitmap suffix appended. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来设置`stop.bmp`的工具箱图标为`StopSignControl`。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to set `stop.bmp` as the toolbox icon for the `StopSignControl`. 此示例假定存在名为 16 的 16 像素位图`stop.bmp`在 c:\\。This example assumes the existence of a 16-by-16-pixel bitmap named `stop.bmp` at c:\\. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/cpp/usercontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/CS/usercontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ToolBoxBitmapExamples/VB/usercontrol1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数中定义指定的类型的程序集中嵌入的资源搜索`t`参数。This constructor searches for an embedded resource in the assembly that defines the type specified by the `t` parameter. 构造函数搜索的资源名为的 namespace.classname.bmp，其中命名空间是命名空间包含由指定的类定义`t`参数。The constructor searches for a resource named namespace.classname.bmp, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the class specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，在 AssemblyA.dll NamespaceA ControlA 是否，则构造函数搜索 AssemblyA.dll 资源名称为 NamespaceA.ControlA.bmp。For example, if ControlA is in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll, then the constructor searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.ControlA.bmp. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数来设置按钮控件的图标的工具箱图标名为`StopSignControl3`。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to set the icon of the button control to the toolbox icon for a named `StopSignControl3`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数中定义指定的类型的程序集中嵌入的资源搜索`t`参数。This constructor searches for an embedded resource in the assembly that defines the type specified by the `t` parameter. 此构造函数搜索名为 namespace.name 的资源，其中 namespace 是包含由 `t` 参数指定的类的定义的命名空间。The constructor searches for a resource named namespace.name, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the class specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，假设 ControlA 是在 AssemblyA.dll NamespaceA 中的类和传递"MyBitmap.bmp"，到`name`参数。For example, suppose that ControlA is a class in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll and that you passed "MyBitmap.bmp" to the `name` parameter. 然后在构造函数搜索 AssemblyA.dll 的名为 NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp 资源。Then the constructor searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数来设置`StopSignControl2.bmp`的工具箱图标为`StopSignControl2`。'The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to set `StopSignControl2.bmp` as a toolbox icon for the `StopSignControl2`. 此示例假定存在名为 16 的 16 像素位图`StopSignControl2.bmp`使用其**BuildAction**属性设置为**EmbeddedResource**。This example assumes the existence of a 16-by-16-pixel bitmap named `StopSignControl2.bmp` with its **BuildAction** property set to **EmbeddedResource**. returns.span: 基于检索到的位图的 对象。

span.span: An object based on the retrieved bitmap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法搜索的资源名为的 namespace.imgName，其中命名空间是命名空间包含由指定的类型定义`t`参数。This method searches for a resource named namespace.imgName, where namespace is the namespace containing the definition of the type specified by the `t` parameter. 例如，假设将传递到 typeof （controla）`t`参数，将"MyBitmap.bmp"传递给 imgName 参数。For example, suppose you pass typeof(ControlA) to the `t` parameter and you pass "MyBitmap.bmp" to the imgName parameter. 如果控件： 在 NamespaceA AssemblyA.dll 中，此方法对资源名称为 NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp 搜索 AssemblyA.dll。If ControlA is in NamespaceA in AssemblyA.dll, then this method searches AssemblyA.dll for a resource named NamespaceA.MyBitmap.bmp. 此方法用于检索嵌入在程序集中的 16x16 位图资源。This method is intended to retrieve a 16 x 16 bitmap resource that is embedded in an assembly. 但是，没有任何嵌入的位图，其大小为 16 x 16 的要求。However, there is no requirement that the embedded bitmap has a size of 16 x 16. 从 （无论何种大小） 的程序集检索到的位图被视为小图像。The bitmap that is retrieved from the assembly (no matter what size) is considered the small image. 大型映像创建的缩放到的大小为 32 x 32"小"的图像。The large image is created by scaling the "small" image to a size of 32 x 32. 因此大图像将始终为 32 × 32，而不考虑从该程序集检索到的位图的大小。So the large image will always be 32 by 32, regardless of the size of the bitmap retrieved from the assembly.
